name: Sailing the DivorSeas
description:
Recently divorced, you’ve lost yourself in a hurricane of heartache. After speaking with your therapist, it's about time for you to go after a fresh start. This leads to seeing new and old faces, all familiar heartbreak. Will your ship lose its way or will you steady the course?

This game is a demo released for Otome Jam 2022! Further game updates will be done in "chapters", and release dates for those chapters will be decided at later dates. 

Sailing the Divorseas follows the player a few months after their divorce got finalized. After suggestions from their therapist, they go to group therapy made specifically for divorcees. Surrounded by others who have gone through heartbreak, whether recent or years old, maybe all together the hearts can be healed. 

Meet Our Love Interests: 

And two more to come in later chapters!
